body_html:
@carpodaster omg yes! finally someone addresses this, I've been thinking about it forever — every time I see the Rollbar warning. We do have a favicon.ico already though and it's in public/images/favicon.ico. Sorry to rain on your (rainbow) parade 😂

Not sure why or how it's not being found. Any ideas?

body:
@carpodaster omg yes! finally someone addresses this, I've been thinking about it forever — every time I see the Rollbar warning. We **do** have a favicon.ico already though and it's in `public/images/favicon.ico`. Sorry to rain on your (rainbow) parade 😂 

Not sure why or how it's not being found. Any ideas?
